title: Terror by night
creator_credit: Universal Studios and Roy William Neill
brief_description: Sherlock Holmes and Watson find themselves aboard the London-Edinburgh Express, guarding the priceless “Star of Rhodesia” diamond. A series of murders leads them on a trail confused by disguise and impersonation. Starring Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce. Adapted from a story by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
